name: Digital Text Locations Demo for BibleTech 2015
tagline: A demo demonstrating the basics of creating locations for digital texts
body:
### Welcome to my BibleTech 2015 Demo
Feel free to grab the code here to get a hands on feel for the basics of the algorithm.

### Overview of the Steps
This code demonstrates the following concepts outlined in my talk:

1. Chunk the Text
2. Hash the Chunks
3. Build an Index

### Significant Contributors to the Concept

* @StephenLJohnson 
* @dtrotzjr
* @mellowfish
* @adamhewitt627
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
